Commun.ity is a neighborhood connect platform that brings together neighbors in order to support each other and facilitates real world interactions between them. It combines social + on-demand. The neighbors can engage into the community by following the news and events. Also, they can hire help for daily life chores like running errands, yard work or baby sitting from the people in the neighborhood.www.communityforus.com

Upsilon Labs was created with the mission to be a solid technology partner of startups. We help startups build their innovative tech products with high quality and low costs. We are the trusted champions for non-technical founders so that they can realize their dreams of building their vision through technology. We are also there as a supportive friend for the technical founders to help augment their efforts to being their dream product to life.As a CO & Technical architect - I love working with founders to help them distill their product requirements, chose the right technologies and build the team of very skilled developers. I over see the development to ensure that the product is being build to the highest quality. I have architected innovative solutions for web/mobile/data platforms leading development teams to build high quality s/w products.

Girls in Tech (GIT) is a global non-profit focused on the engagement, education and empowerment of girls and women who are passionate about technology. Today, GIT aims to accelerate the growth of innovative women entering into the high-tech industry and building startups. We achieve this through the creation of proprietary, innovative programming and strategic global partnerships.GIT is not just for professional women. We exist for anyone with an interest in technology, startups and providing women with a platform for growth. But we operate with the spirit of the girl within all of us—fearless, lively and determined.GIT Phoenix is actively looking for strategic partnerships with Phoenix based tech companies in order to further support the cause and maximize the impact. Contact me if you want to be associated with this awesome mission driven organization!

- Designing and developing large scale enterprise applications in various technologies.- Extensive experience in large scale enterprise application development using Java EE (J2EE) on IBM Websphere. Commun.ity allows the people in the local communities to engage into the community by sharing news or setting up events.
